## Load in data ¶ÁÈëÊı¾İ
```{r}
df <- read.csv("FreqMatrix.csv")
```


## Decision Tree Model
### Training 
```{r}
library(rpart)
library(rpart.plot)
modelrpart <- rpart(Cluster~.,method = "class", data = df)
```

### Prediction
```{r}
predrpart <- predict(modelrpart, newdata = df[,1:1286], type = "class")
```

### Confusion Matrix
```{r}
table(predict = predrpart, truth = df$Cluster)
```

### Model Detail
```{r}
print(modelrpart)
```

### Plot the Model
```{r TreeModel}
prp(modelrpart)
```
